mylo1: ^1: "Your welcome, I am here to get the potion that clears 'The Gel'"
alchemist1: ^0: "Oh, why do you need that potion? It is required by only the skilled Slime Hunters!"
need_spells: ^1: "I am on a journey to find Kuro. I need to find him. I need the potion for clearing 'The Gel'."

c-0: ^0: "We will need to go to my alchemy shop. I will give you the potion and some spells there. Follow me."
